title: FE Exclusive: Xiaomi bets on AI and device ecosystem to appeal to masses
description: Xiaomi is focusing on artificial intelligence and a connected device ecosystem to make its products more useful and accessible, aiming to reach a wider audience and strengthen its presence in the mass market.

title: India launches AI skilling drive for 10 lakh youth, to be completed in a year: Ashwini Vaishnaw
description: A mega skilling programme aimed at imparting knowledge of Artificial Intelligence to as many as 10 lakh individuals across the country has been kicked off on Tuesday, from Rajasthan, during the regional AI summit that was held in the run-up to the AI summit to be held next month in India.

title: Japan’s long return to artificial intelligence
description: Japan’s re-engagement with artificial intelligence is commonly framed as “catching up.”
content:
In the neon-lit laboratories of 1980s Japan, the future seemed already written.
While Silicon Valley was in its infancy, Tokyo was already pouring billions into several major technology programs aimed at supporting cutting-edge scientific research. T... [600 chars]

title: Rajasthan Unveils AI & Machine Learning Policy 2026; Employment Policy to Integrate AI
description: Rajasthan has launched its Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI/ML) Policy 2026 at the Regional AI Impact Conference 2026, held alongside Rajasthan DigiFest X TiE Global Summit 2026. The policy aims to align the state with national digital priorities and accelerate technology-led growth.

title: efficiency AI at CES 2026
description: SK hynix unveiled its next generation of artificial intelligence memory chips, including a 16-layer HBM4, at CES 2026 in Las Vegas on Tuesday. The chipmaker opened a customer-only exhibition booth to deepen engagement with key clients as the demand for high-performance memory continues to rise.

title: Next generation of chips in full production
description: Nvidia chief executive Jensen Huang said the company's next generation of chips is in "full production", saying they can deliver five times the artificial-intelligence computing of the company's previous chips when serving up chatbots and other AI apps.

title: Can AI Legally Turn $100,000 Into $1 Million? Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman Says That's The Real Test Of Intelligence
description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman says the modern test of artificial intelligence is not whether it can sound human but whether an AI agent can legally turn $100,000 into $1 million, as Big Tech intensifies its race toward AGI amid a fierce talent war.
content:
On Monday, Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman says the next milestone toward artificial general intelligence won't be about sounding human, but about whether an AI agent can independently and legally create real economic value.
